title: Venison and beer casserole
ingredients: ['100g streaky bacon, cut 3cm long', '1 teaspoon lard or butter', '675g diced venison, 3cm (1in) cubes', '1 dessertspoon sunflower oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 celery stick, finely sliced', '1 carrot, finely sliced', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '5 juniper berries, lightly crushed', '3 whole black peppercorns', '200ml beef stock', '75ml light coloured beer']
